Hero.title: Digital Social Protection Platform
Hero.content: Register and verify social protection identity data, provide various social protection benefits and services through an integrated digital platform.

SPR.title: Social Protection Registry
SPR.what_is_spr_desc: Social Protection Registry is a unified registry that facilitates interoperability between the databases of all social assistance and social security operators. It allows for synchronization, updating, and data exchange within a digital ecosystem.
SPR.advantages_of_spr: Benefits of the Social Protection Registry

advantages_of_spr_items.item1: Harmonizes data across the entire social protection system.
advantages_of_spr_items.item2: Provides a Social Protection Identification Number (SPID) for beneficiary and target group identification.
advantages_of_spr_items.item4: Ensures identity data verification within the social protection system, reducing identity fraud and duplicate benefit provision.

Portal.title: Digital Social Protection Platform
Portal.what_is_portal: What is Digital Social Protection Platform?
Portal.what_isPortal_desc: Digital Social Protection Platform is a unified digital platform that facilitates registration, identity verification, and eligibility check for accessing social protection benefits and provides various social protection services.
Portal.advantages_of_portal: Benefits of the Digital Social Protection Platform

advantages_of_portal_items.item1: Enhances efficiency and speed in implementing national social assistance programs and social security schemes.
advantages_of_portal_items.item2: Harmonizes the registration and data management systems for social protection.
advantages_of_portal_items.item3: Improves the quality and timeliness of data.
advantages_of_portal_items.item4: Provides better accessibility for beneficiaries to access various social protection services.

important_features.feature2: Verify social protection identity through SPID
important_features.feature3: Synchronize data within an integrated ecosystem

general_info_list.info1_q: What is the Digital Social Protection Platform?
general_info_list.info1_a: Register and verify social protection identity data, provide various social protection benefits and services through an integrated digital platform.
general_info_list.info2_q: How does Social Protection Registry benefit Social Protection?
general_info_list.info2_a:
To integrate their MIS systems into the Digital Social Protection Platform registration system, operators must follow this Integrated Document 

 https://digitalsp.gov.kh/
